extendedInfo.description: **The New MISTER will be available for Google Play in Fall 2013, but you can still chat with great MISTER men using this version. Download and join MISTER today and we'll send you an alert when The New MISTER (2.0) for Android is ready.**MISTER is a free gay dating app for men looking to chat and meet other hot gay, bi, or curious guys.  MISTER men tend to be more mature, masculine, and down-to-earth than on other gay dating apps.MISTER men are diverse: Theyâre suit-and-tie professionals and carefree outdoors-men, tattooed gay skaters and beer-guzzling bears, leather men and vegan yogis, self-proclaimed flirts and relationship-minded homebodies. In all, there are over 300,000 men of all ages, types and races from around the world cruising MISTER.Less Attitude, More Real Men:MISTER men are encouraged to follow the MR Code.  It stands for Maturity, Integrity, Safety, Truth, Enjoyment and Respect.  Because of that, guys on MISTER tend to be more serious about actually meeting and getting to know other men than on other apps.  Profiles on MISTER tend to be more personal and in-depth.Features:- Post up to 10 photos for free on your profile so you donât have to wait every time you send a pic.- Primary photos on the MR Mangrid are 50% bigger than other apps like Grindr, Scruff and Jack'd.- Sort profiles by last login or closest to you.  Or chat with guys around the world on the Global tab.  You can change you view at any time to see more men. .- Free push notifications! Never miss an important message again.- Use www.misterapp.com on your desktop to do searches, check messages and surf the app from home.Download and sign up for MISTER for free!MISTER is for adult gay, bi and curious men over 18 years old only.  Photos that display nudity or sexually suggestive poses will be removed immediately.  For more information visit www.misterapp.comCreated by Daddyhunt.com (We â¤ Daddies!)

reviews.title: More filters
reviews.comment: Need more filters besides just age. Be nice to see those who are online only. In my local listing, the screen of 33 guys and only one that is online or had been online in the past 3 days; and it never seems to change.
reviews.author: Brian Bolster

reviews.title: Hot, older, bougey men
reviews.comment: I do like it better than the other apps I\'ve used. The men are older (luv tht) BUT the attitudes are still there.  Otherwise wulda given more stars
reviews.author: Sal V

reviews.title: Pretty disappointing experience
reviews.comment: Operation of the app is slow, even with a good data connection. Basic functions such as sending/receiving messages don\'t work smoothly. Messages have to be refreshed each time you send/receive a message to  be sure the thread is updated. The link between the app and a pay website wasn\'t readily apparent-basic functions available unrestricted on other apps are limited or pay only.
reviews.author: Demetrius Junior

reviews.title: Watchout scruff and grindr!
reviews.comment: Here comes Mr. -- easy to use interface and users are more polite. Have yet to deal with a bot profile.
reviews.author: Will SF

reviews.title: Slow and not user friendly
reviews.comment: Very slow app Doesn\'t support nudes via app  Not very user friendly All features other sites give for free. Are paid features here.
reviews.author: Blake Hedges

reviews.title: Womp
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I access the profiles of people who send me messages? This seems like a fatal flaw. (I have a droid for the record).
reviews.author: David Hyman

reviews.title: Worst ever.
reviews.comment: Why do you want to guys in your area who have not been on line for10 week leer alone52weeks. Get it together.
reviews.author: dan scott

reviews.title: Cool communication system
reviews.comment: Gave it 4 cause sometimes you see that a message came in but would not appear on Messenger
reviews.author: Juan Canaan

reviews.title: Always crashing on startup
reviews.comment: Each and every time I try and run the app it freezes then crashes.  Uninstalled and reinstalled but same problem
reviews.author: Simon McLeod

reviews.title: Good app breaks occasionally
reviews.comment: A pretty good app overall.
reviews.author: Andrew Martin

reviews.title: Good app for dating,  hooking up
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app with nice feature. However, it doesn\'t allow some kind of hot pictures while other apps do. It\'s slow sometimes. One more important thing that the gps is totally wrong.  Someone lives 22 miles, but this app show 12 miles while some others live 10 miles,  but this app shows 20 miles away.  Otherwise,  I\'d rate it 5 stars
reviews.author: Phuong Le

reviews.title: Frustrating.
reviews.comment: Could be great but is poor. Have to click on pics of members who have been on in their lifetime until finally, every so often, finding someone who is actually online. Also looking at other locations cumbersome.
reviews.author: Michael Early

reviews.title: Faulty app
reviews.comment: Isn\'t really compatible with my Galaxy s4..download it later again maybe
reviews.author: David Zas

reviews.title: Not Impressed.
reviews.comment: This app is supposed to be better than the others? The layout is poorly planned and it\'s missing some basic functions (ex. deleting messages is one of them). There\'s nothing impressive about this app and at $9.99 a month for \"premium\" service it\'s not worth the incestment. Nice try Mister but this is a fail.
reviews.author: Craig Mingus

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: While I realize the site is still a beta,  one thing that is noticeably different between thel site and others is its empathis on being nice to others and having a code of honor. I think this is very cool and makes me feel more comfortable with the site. I\'m not sure, but I suspect the webmaster may be a little more in tune with people\'s behavior on the site, then some of these typical \"anything goes\" apps.  I in n I
reviews.author: John Dyar

reviews.title: Could be MUCH Better
reviews.comment: Putting the distance is good but why not include the city name? When you are chatting with someone 1,000 miles away and you have no idea where they are, they could literally be anywhere. This is just useless.  Your 200 limit sucks and not in a good way. In large cities you see the same 200 people all the time and not all of the other ones that you know are out there.   Hope the revision in the fall solves some of these problems otherwise you are done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting Better
reviews.comment: A few needed updates and the app is improving. Not as sleek as some others but functional.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Middling
reviews.comment: It\'s okay but needs a lot of work.  My app does not let me see the profiles of guys who send me messages.
reviews.author: Manuel Rey Arocho

reviews.title: Gets the job none
reviews.comment: As these apps go pretty good. Clean interface and quick. The features lacking can be found in the premium app
reviews.author: Randy Erickson

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: It is very easy to use and is just a lot of fun. Now if we could have a part to where it was bottoms looking for tops andake the whole process a lil easier. 5 stars!
reviews.author: Joshua Jolly
